document_data.name: Valero Brokengulf
document_data.mainbody: '''Valero Brokengulf''' was a member of [[House Brokengulf]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Valero had a deeply hatred of [[Claugiyliamatar]].
document_data.History: Valero always wanted to destroy his old family's enemy, Claugiyliamatar. In 1489 DR, rumors arose that the [[Cult of the Dragon]] wanted to transform her into a [[dracolich]] at last. With the support of [[House Silmerhelve]], Valero hired an adventuring party to defeat the great dragon.{{Cite adventurers league/Corruption in Kryptgarden|7}}
